website_summaries.verdict: Affordable mouthguard that's ready to wear and works well for most customers and for playing many types of sports.
pros: Soft material is comfortable for most wearers and doesn't require boiling to shape
cons: Somewhat bulky, so it may not work well for smaller mouths

customer_reviews.title: Best one for braces
customer_reviews.text: This mouthguard is perfect for a child with braces. My son finds other mouthguards too bulky and he has braces, so we needed the perfect mouthguard for him to use and this one was the perfect mouthguard to use for football this year with his braces. It wasn't too bulky or hard. He was comfortable with wearing it for the long practices and games. He said, "It's just perfect!" I would totally recommend this protective mouthguard for the size and the material. It lasted the full season as well.
customer_reviews.author: julie33651

customer_reviews.title: Can fit an adult
customer_reviews.text: I am an adult but I have a small mouth. I got this because I grind my teeth at night and snore a bit with my sinuses. The mouth guard is almost too big for my mouth It rubs my gums in the front and side a bit but I don’t want to cut it to make it fit. I have not been able to wear all night yet but it does work
customer_reviews.author: Michele Watson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, No Boil Mouthpiece
customer_reviews.text: This is a hefty mouthpiece. It is so soft to the feel in your mouth. You DO NOT have to boil it. Just put it in and start using it. I had to adjust mine by cutting away a small portion on the top so that it would not dig in to my upper gums. But it was easily done with a razor knife. Now it fits to perfection and it is the most comfortable mouthpiece I have ever had. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Great fit. Great protection. Bought for daughter who competes in karate and protects from injury and the braces.
customer_reviews.author: rlm13

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Simple first use. Fit my 11 year old well. Comfortable and way to breathe out of. No boiling needed
customer_reviews.author: Brian Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! My daughter was having a rough time with the mouth guard she got from the orthodontist after getting her braces on but with this mouth guard she doesn’t feel any pain or discomfort, great buy
customer_reviews.author: Anila Rice

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Nice and soft. Had to clip more in the center to swallow. Works great for grinding and clenching
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S.

customer_reviews.title: Wrestlers with braces need this!
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this for wrestling and loves it. He lost his at the last tournament so I ordered another one and got it in time for his next match.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mouth guard for braces!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for braces and is as simple to use as opening it and popping it in!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered in a timely manner and fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Martha Meza

customer_reviews.title: Way too bulky
customer_reviews.text: This mouth guard is extremely bulky. Not functional. Got for our 12 year old to use in Jiu Jitsu after she got braces. It collects spit and flies out of her mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Can be painful
customer_reviews.text: Soft and comfortable, but the are too tall and hurt gums
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: My husband use this mouthpiece for boxing to avoid grinding on his teeth, after using it for less than 10 days it was completely built through as you can see in the picture. Very unhappy with this product don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: SHERRY ELLIS

customer_reviews.title: Needs a smaller guard
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but is was too big for my 10 year olds mouth
customer_reviews.author: Willis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for braces!
customer_reviews.text: My son has braces. This mouth guard was perfect to use with his braces.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Hauhio

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 for my daughter who plays soccer and my son who wrestles and they love that they can breathe better than your normal mouth guard!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

product_meta.title: Teeth Walls Sport Mouth Guard - Youth Mouthguard for Braces - Sparring Mouth Guard - Large Size, Premium Quality No Boiling Required，Football, Basketball
product_meta.description:
Description

Healthy and happy sports are what we most yearn for. In order to make a safe, comfortable and well-fitting sports mouthguard, 
we choose the safety material and consider the user comfort.Designed to protect your upper and lower teeth without boiling, this 
soft motion mask keeps your teeth safe during exercise .

Do not recommend orthodontic personnel use!
Recommended Sports: 
※ Football 
※ Wrestling and Boxing Baseball, Basketball, Tennis 
※ Jiu Jitsu, Taekwondo, Karate, Judo, MMA, and other martial Arts 
※ Roller Skating and Roller Derby 

Shipping list: 1Count
feature_bullets: ※ 【100% SAFETY】 that it's not meant to be molded,no need foring, er high temperature boil gonomically Designed to.
※ 【SUITABLE FOR CUTTING】you can also trim yourself to the right size，it gives teeth better protection and comfort during exercise.

※ 【SOFT DESIGN】upper and lower teeth protection，when you put it on your teeth, you don't feel uncomfortable with something hard on it, which can cause damage to the flesh. And it comes with a delicate small box. When you don't use it, wash it and put it in it. It's convenient and sanitary to put it in your bag.
※ 【REGULAR UPDATES】(please replace your mouth guard every 3 months at least).
※ Please feel free to contact our sales team if you have any questions。
